comments.html: You gave me a great idea: I'll refactor the script to accept input from IMAP or clipboard and return results to SMTP or clipboard. That way you could reply to LinkedIn recruiters (or whoever else) without investing in working with an API.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: This is a great idea, with all sorts of fun applications include confuddlement of things surveilling one's email activity ..
comments.name: Anne Johnson

comments.html: This is great! Next target: recruiters on LinkedIn? Maybe in the style of Ernest GPT Hemingway.
comments.name: Jaap de Vos
